entries.title: Hello Indexed Square
entries.description: Render a quad using indices to reduce vertex definitions and a single interleaved buffer holding both positions and colors for each vertex.

entries.title: Textured Cube
entries.description: Use the mouse to rotate / pan / zoom the camera. Shows multisampled rendering via a textured cube.

entries.title: Hello glTF Triangle
entries.description: Parse the simplest glTF containing a single triangle with positions and indices.
